newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela's Congress re-opens sessions Feb 12.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela's Congress re-opens sessions Feb 12.

text.p: Venezuela's Congress will re-open for a month of extraordinary sessions on Feb 12, legislators said, with special priority given to discussion of a revamped Debt Rescue Fund bill, casino law and judicial reform.
Congress President Cristobal Fernandez Dalo told reporters the extra sessions would run through to March 12, when Congress resumes its normal work schedule.
